md5.description: MD5 hash of the file content in base64

ctf_event_id.description: The ID of the CTF the challenge was taken from

description.description: A short text describing the challenge

score.description: The number of points given to the solver

slug.description: A unique string that can be used in URLs

fault.description: Is the error a server-side fault?

id.description: ID is a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

message.description: Message is a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

name.description: Name is the name of this class of errors.

example.school_name: Consequuntur rerum fuga deserunt explicabo animi eveniet.

end_date.description: Ending date of the monthly challenge

start_date.description: Starting date of the monthly challenge
